mapper.select: SELECT dsd.number, dsd.house_id as houseId, m. NAME, m.mobile, dsd.ship_address as shipAddress, dosi.product_name as productName, dosi.product_sn as productSn, dosi.image, dosi.num, dosi.price, dosi.total_price as totalPrice FROM dj_deliver_split_deliver dsd INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item dosi ON dsd.order_split_id = dosi.order_split_id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = dsd.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON h.member_id = m.id WHERE dsd.order_split_id=#{orderSplitId}

SELECT rmd.number, rmd.house_id as houseId, m. NAME, m.mobile, rmd.ship_address as shipAddress, rmm.product_name as productName, rmm.product_sn as productSn, rmm.image, rmm.price, rmm.total_price as totalPrice, rmm.shop_count as shopCount, rmm.actual_count as actualCount FROM dj_repair_mend_deliver rmd INNER JOIN dj_repair_mend_materiel rmm ON rmm.mend_order_id = rmd.mend_order_id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = rmd.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON h.member_id = m.id WHERE rmd.mend_order_id = #{mendOrderId}

SELECT m.NAME as workerName, m.mobile as workerMobile FROM dj_house h INNER JOIN dj_core_house_flow chf ON h.id = chf.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.id = chf.worker_id WHERE chf.worker_type_id = 3 AND h.id = #{houseId}
